title: CowboyStudio Complete Reflector System with 40-Inch x 60-Inch 5 in 1 Photo Studio Reflector Panel, Reflector Arm Holder and Light Stand
description: This reflector holder set is perfect for positioning your reflectors during a photo shoot. It's very easy to assemble, simply attach the reflector to the stand via the reflector arm and position as needed. Great to use if you don’t have an assistant, this setup makes solo photography fast and easy. Reflector Has five different reflector colors: Gold: warm up the picture; Silver: brighten the picture; White: bounce light into shadows; Black: block out unwanted light; Translucent: soften light, often used overhead. 40" x 60" in size. Folds easily to fit in its case. Case is black heavy duty material with a sturdy zipper. Reflector arm can hold reflectors up to 5’ 2”. Made from aluminum alloy with satin silver finish. Easily mounted on any standard light stand.
